org.cast.cwm.data
Class Period

java.lang.Object
  org.cast.cwm.data.PersistedObject
      org.cast.cwm.data.Period
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Period>
@Entity
public class Period
extends PersistedObject
implements Comparable<Period>

A named group of User objects. Conceptually, this should be used to organize users into classrooms of students and teachers.

Users can belong to many Periods. Any given Period can only belong to one Site.

See Also:

Get a set of users in this period, filtered by a specific role.

Deprecated in favor of using models.

compareTo

public int compareTo(Period other)
Periods are sorted alphabetically by name. This function is careful to avoid NPEs and avoids returning 0 for two Periods that have different IDs.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface Comparable<Period>
